entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 3:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %

Wind: ENE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
